verses.verse: And it came<WH1961> to pass a long<WH7227> time<WH3117> after<WH310> that the LORD<WH3068> had given rest<WH5117> to Israel<WH3478> from all<WH3605> their enemies<WH341> round<WH5439> about, that Joshua<WH3091> waxed old<WH2204> and stricken<WH935> in age.<WH3117>

And Joshua<WH3091> called<WH7121> for all<WH3605> Israel,<WH3478> and for their elders,<WH2205> and for their heads,<WH7218> and for their judges,<WH8199> and for their officers,<WH7860> and said<WH559> to them, I am old<WH2204> and stricken<WH935> in age:<WH3117>

And you have seen<WH7200> all<WH3605> that the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> has done<WH6213> to all<WH3605> these<WH428> nations<WH1471> because<WH6440> of you; for the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> is he that has fought<WH3898> for you.

Behold,<WH7200> I have divided<WH5307> to you by lot these<WH428> nations<WH1471> that remain,<WH7604> to be an inheritance<WH5159> for your tribes,<WH7626> from Jordan,<WH3383> with all<WH3605> the nations<WH1471> that I have cut<WH3772> off, even to the great<WH1419> sea<WH3220> westward.<WH3996> <WH8121>

And the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> he shall expel<WH1920> them from before<WH6440> you, and drive<WH3423> them from out of your sight;<WH6440> and you shall possess<WH3423> their land,<WH776> as the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> has promised<WH1696> to you.

Be you therefore very<WH3966> courageous<WH2388> to keep<WH8104> and to do<WH6213> all<WH3605> that is written<WH3789> in the book<WH5612> of the law<WH8451> of Moses,<WH4872> that you turn<WH5493> not aside therefrom to the right<WH3225> hand<WH3225> or to the left;<WH8040>

That you come<WH935> not among these<WH428> nations,<WH1471> these<WH428> that remain<WH7604> among you; neither<WH3808> make mention<WH2142> of the name<WH8034> of their gods,<WH430> nor<WH3808> cause to swear<WH7650> by them, neither<WH3808> serve<WH5647> them, nor<WH3808> bow<WH7812> yourselves to them:
But hold<WH1692> to the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> as you have done<WH6213> to this<WH2088> day.<WH3117>

For the LORD<WH3068> has driven<WH3423> out from before<WH6440> you great<WH1419> nations<WH1471> and strong:<WH6099> but as for you, no<WH3808> man<WH376> has been able<WH5975> to stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> you to this<WH2088> day.<WH3117>
One<WH259> man<WH376> of you shall chase<WH7291> a thousand:<WH505> for the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> he it is that fights<WH3898> for you, as he has promised<WH1696> you.
Take good<WH3966> heed<WH8104> therefore to yourselves,<WH5315> that you love<WH157> the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>

Else<WH3588> if<WH518> you do in any wise go<WH7725> back,<WH7725> and join<WH1692> to the remnant<WH3499> of these<WH428> nations,<WH1471> even these<WH428> that remain<WH7604> among<WH854> you, and shall make marriages<WH2859> with them, and go<WH935> in to them, and they to you:

Know<WH3045> for a certainty that the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> will no<WH3808> more<WH3254> drive<WH3423> out any of these<WH428> nations<WH1471> from before<WH6440> you; but they shall be snares<WH6341> and traps<WH4170> to you, and scourges<WH7850> in your sides,<WH6654> and thorns<WH6796> in your eyes,<WH5869> until<WH5704> you perish<WH6> from off<WH5921> this<WH2063> good<WH2896> land<WH127> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> has given<WH5414> you.

And, behold,<WH2009> this day<WH3117> I am going<WH1980> the way<WH1870> of all<WH3605> the earth:<WH776> and you know<WH3045> in all<WH3605> your hearts<WH3824> and in all<WH3605> your souls,<WH5315> that not one<WH259> thing<WH1697> has failed<WH5307> of all<WH3605> the good<WH2896> things<WH1697> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> spoke<WH1696> concerning<WH5921> you; all<WH3605> are come<WH935> to pass to you, and not one<WH259> thing<WH1697> has failed<WH5307> thereof.

Therefore it shall come<WH1961> to pass, that as all<WH3605> good<WH2896> things<WH1697> are come<WH935> on you, which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> promised<WH1696> you; so<WH3651> shall the LORD<WH3068> bring<WH935> on you all<WH3605> evil<WH7451> things,<WH1697> until<WH5704> he have destroyed<WH8045> you from off<WH5921> this<WH2063> good<WH2896> land<WH127> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> has given<WH5414> you.

When you have transgressed<WH5674> the covenant<WH1285> of the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> which<WH834> he commanded<WH6680> you, and have gone<WH1980> and served<WH5647> other<WH312> gods,<WH430> and bowed<WH7812> yourselves to them; then shall the anger<WH639> of the LORD<WH3068> be kindled<WH2734> against you, and you shall perish<WH6> quickly<WH4120> from off<WH5921> the good<WH2896> land<WH776> which<WH834> he has given<WH5414> to you.
